comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: See www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/3238476359/ for more about Phyllis Neilson-Terry, an English actress. Lyn Harding was a Welsh actor with a long careeron stage and then in films. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lyn_Harding According to NYT, October 6, 1912, query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9904E2D7113AE633A... he created the title role of Drake (Sir Francis Drake), a play in which Phyllis Neilson-Terry played Queen Elizabeth I. More about the production, including pictures, at myweb.tiscali.co.uk/stage2/produce/drake/th-drake.html

comment._content: Swanq and Pixel Wrangler: thanks for the additional information. We'll fix the typo in Phyllis in the source data and reload the description.
